## ProgressBuilderOptions.gradient property

Gradient configuration for the filled portion.

**Signature:**

```typescript
gradient?: {
        start: ColorInput;
        end: ColorInput;
        scaleGradientToProgress?: boolean;
    };
```

## Remarks

When set, overrides `fullColor` and creates a smooth color gradient from `start` to `end`<!-- -->. The `scaleGradientToProgress` option controls whether the gradient spans the entire bar width or only the filled portion.
